name: InView
description: InView is a web application that helps the Users to manage their investments in stocks and other openly traded securities. Its connected to a realtime stock API to calculates the return on investment based on the past investments.

name: MostLikely
description: MostLikely is a full-stack web app built with React and Express.js. Itâ€™s a multiplayer game featuring a simple yet fun game loop, where players create and answer questions about who is "most likely" to do something. Real-time interaction between players is handled through socket.io.
